subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Clint Bowyer won the Sylvania 300 at New Hampshire Motor Speedway, ending an 88-race losing streak and lifting him to second in the standings.
snippet: Clint Bowyer won the Sylvania 300 at New Hampshire Motor Speedway, ending an 88-race losing streak and lifting him to second in the standings.
